titleStmt.title: Pleasures vision with deserts complaint, and a short dialogue of a womans properties, betweene an old man and a young. By Arthur Newman of the Middle Temple Gent
titleStmt.author: Newman, Arthur.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G[eorge] E[ld] for Thomas Bayly, and are to be sold at his shop in the Middle-row in Holbourne neere Staple Inne,
